com.ibm.mobile.services.core

Class IBMBluemix

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.mobile.services.core.IBMBluemix

  • public final class IBMBluemix
extends java.lang.Object
    Your Android application must initialize the Mobile Cloud Services SDK and all the services used by the application. Add the following initialization code to the `MainActivity` class in your application. The `context` value could be your main `Activity` class. The *applicationId* value is the unique key that is assigned to the Mobile Cloud application that you created on BlueMix. The *applicationSecret* is revokable key that is assigned to the Mobile Cloud application that you created on Bluemix. The *applicationRoute* value is the route that is assigned to the Mobile Cloud application that you created on BlueMix. 
     IBMBluemix.initialize(context, applicationId, applicationSecret, applicationRoute);

    • Method Detail

      • clearSecurityToken

        public static Task<IBMCurrentUser> clearSecurityToken()
        The clearSecurityToken() method is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. Resets the security context to null. 
         IBMBluemix.clearSecurityToken().continueWith(new Continuation<IBMCurrentUser, Void>() {
        @Override
        public Void then(Task<IBMCurrentUser> task) throws Exception {
                if (task.isFaulted()) {
                        // Security token was not valid and rejected by the MAS service.
                } else {
                        // Security token was successfully set with the MAS service
                }
                return null;
        }
 });
        Returns:
        The Task result will be the IBMCurrentUser object that was just cleared. A call to getCurrentUser() will return null following this call.

      • getCurrentDevice

        public static IBMCurrentDevice getCurrentDevice()
        The getCurrentDevice() method is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases.
        Returns:
        The current iOS device using the SDK.

      • getCurrentUser

        public static IBMCurrentUser getCurrentUser()
        The getCurrentUser() method is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases.
        Returns:
        The current user that is logged in (if any)

      • getVersion

        public static java.lang.String getVersion()
        The current version of the Bluemix SDK
        Returns:

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.content.Context context,
              java.lang.String applicationId,
              java.lang.String applicationSecret,
              java.lang.String applicationRoute)
        This must be the first method called. It initializes the IBMBluemix SDK framework.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android Context used for initialization
        applicationId - The IBM Mobile Cloud Services application's id
        applicationSecret - The IBM Mobile Cloud Services application's secret
        applicationRoute - The IBM Mobile Cloud Services application's route

      • setSecurityToken

        public static Task<IBMCurrentUser> setSecurityToken(IBMBluemix.IBMSecurityProvider provider,
                                    java.lang.String token)
        The setSecurityToken(IBMSecurityProvider, String) method is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. Sets the security token and the provider used to obtain and validate it. The token will be validated and decoded on the MAS service. 
         IBMBluemix.setSecurityToken(IBMSecurityProvider.GOOGLE, google_token).continueWith(new Continuation<IBMCurrentUser, Void>() {
        @Override
        public Void then(Task<IBMCurrentUser> task) throws Exception {
                if (task.isFaulted()) {
                        // Security token was not valid and rejected by the MAS service.
                } else {
                        // Security token was successfully set with the MAS service.  
                        // The IBMCurrentUser for the currently authenticated user is the result
                        IBMCurrentUser currentUser = task.getResult();
                }
                // Return null if you are not chaining another bolts task
                return null;
        }
 });
        Parameters:
        provider - The IBMBluemix.IBMSecurityProvider used to obtain and validate the token
        token - The user's security token received from the provider
        Returns:
        A Task that will indicate the status of the authentication.
